text: The Steganinae is the smaller of two subfamilies in the fruit fly family Drosophilidae.D.A. Grimaldi 1990. A phylogenetic, revised classification of genera in the Drosophilidae (Diptera). Bulletin of the American Museum of Natural History 197: 1-128. The other subfamily is the Drosophilinae. == References == Category:Drosophila
title: Steganinae
